Question: Shenzhen Jingweixian Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Jingweixian Technology Co., Ltd

Product: Cutting Plotters and Film Cutting Machines

- Established in 2015, specializes in environmentally friendly and precise cutting plotters and film cutting machines
- Offers over 20 cutting plotter series, 30 film cutting machine series, and 10 label machine series
- Features continuous cutting for long patterns, durable materials for smooth cutting, and high precision with swiftness
- Provides models with different technical parameters, including ARM cutting plotters with high force and real high speed
- Also offers inkjet plotters with a maximum plotting width of 2100mm, pen plotters with Bluetooth data transmission, and digitizers with high accuracy and compatibility
- The company has a 12,000 sqm production base and serves over 2 million customers worldwide
- Exhibited at CES 2024, showcasing products like the CS310 Film Cutting Machine and Phone Skin Printer
